I Replied to your other thread.

As I said there Karmacoma is correct that the Phase angles screen is not in the new mechjeb. Instead you have to add that info to a custom info window.

There are two ways to do it. one is to use "target planet phase angle" from the target options, this will show you the phase angle between the planet you are currently orbiting and any planet you set as a target.

The other way is "all planet phase angles" which will show a list the phase angles between the planet you are orbiting and all the others.
Pretty sure what you saw Scott using was Protractor, not Mechjeb, a handy little tool that tells you the phase angles for the various bodies.
